block.p: 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,100-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, eat-in kitchen, beamed 10-ft. ceilings, hardwood floors, fireplace; common charge $1,100; taxes $9,132; listed at $1.195 million, 14 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

4-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,100-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, eat-in kitchen, beamed 10-ft. ceilings, hardwood floors, fireplace; common charge $1,100; taxes $9,132; listed at $1.195 million, 14 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

1-bedroom, 2-bath, 950-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, central air-conditioning, East River view, health club and sun deck in building; common charge $512; taxes $7,140; listed at $499,000, 10 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

4-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,900-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, renovated kitchen, 14-ft. ceilings, crown moldings, hardwood floors, 2 exposures; common charge $1,300; taxes $17,400; listed at $1.9 million, 6 weeks on market (broker: A. J. Clarke)

3-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,891-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, windowed kitchen, west exposure, pool and health club in building; common charge $1,310; taxes $11,460; listed at $1.395 million, 2 weeks on market (brokers: Brown Harris Stevens; Halstead Property Co.)

1-bedroom, 2-bath, 920-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, granite kitchen countertops, cherry wood floors, washer/ dryer in unit; common charge $386; taxes $1,728; listed at $670,000, 22 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,800-sq.-ft. co-op in a brownstone; dining area, eat-in kitchen, large living room, original moldings and detail, rear deck, landscaped garden with two-tiered fish pond; maintenance $1,073, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $895,000, 1 week on market (broker: William S. Ross)

6-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 100-year-old 2-family house being used as a single-family residence; dining room, parquet floors, screened-porch, stained-glass windows, landmark district, 50-by-100-ft., lot; taxes $2,580; listed at $600,000, 1 week on market (broker: Mary Kay Gallagher)

4-bedroom, 2-bath, 50-year-old contemporary Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den with 2 skylights and vaulted ceilings, fireplace, central air-conditioning, finished basement, 99-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,417; listed at $668,800, 5 weeks on market (broker: ReMax/Millennium)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 48-year-old colonial; dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen, den, new windows and alarm system, 2-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,512; listed at $458,000, 6 weeks on market (broker: Goller & Costi)

5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 22-year-old colonial; 2-story entry foyer, dining room, family room, breakfast room, 2 fireplaces, whirlpool in master bath, 2-car garage, 0.58-acre lot; taxes $18,900; listed at $799,000, 39 weeks on market (brokers: David Endres Realty Group; Coldwell Banker/Country Properties)

5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 52-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room with cathedral ceilings and wood-burning stove, 2 marble baths, greenhouse, 2-car garage, 2.38-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $7,700; listed at $1.54 million (multiple bids), 10 weeks on market (brokers: William Raveis Real Estate; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)
